subject: p16662264
Findings: PA and lateral views of the chest. There are new bibasilar opacities compatible with right middle lobe and lingular pneumonia. Elsewhere, the lungs are clear and there is no effusion. Cardiomediastinal silhouette is within normal limits. No acute osseous abnormality.
Impression: Right middle lobe and lingular pneumonia. Recommend repeat after treatment to document resolution.
